summary: A disturbing psychological thriller, that engages the audience to the point that it is always caught off guard, thus changing the point of view of the two main performers.
cast: Caroline Goodall|Burt Young|James Parks|Sara Lazzaro|Katie McGovern|Katia Greco|Niccolò Senni|Gianfranco Terrin|Daniel Mba|Paolo Borzì
title: Encerrados
